conclusion: Use the ideal gas law and properties of processes in the p-V diagram to find temperature at state B.
From state A to B is isothermal; from B to C is isobaric.
Since A to B is isothermal, temperature at B is the same as at A.
For isobaric process B to C, use V_B/T_B = V_C/T_C.
Calculate T_B using V_B/T_B = V_C/T_C: T_B = 180 K.
